game.name: Coal LLC
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fill your quota or die. Mine increasingly absurd amounts of coal using some dubious, but effective, mining techniques. Or relax and mine at your own pace in peaceful mode.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fill your quota or die. Mine increasingly absurd amounts of coal using some dubious, but effective, mining techniques. Or relax and mine at your own pace in peaceful mode.

reviewHighlights.text: Awesome fun little game. Highly recommend. Easy to play game, very satisfying. There's a review on here about not progressing after 40 minutes or some...
Dangerously addicting. Do not be fooled by the simplistic premise and graphics, this game will pull you in and keep you coming back for another run.
